mapper.select: SELECT id '아이디', nickname '닉네임', type '타입', slot_balance '슬롯보유금', casino_balance '카지노보유금', p_type 'P타입' FROM admin_user

SELECT au.id '아이디', au.nickname '닉네임', au.type '타입', au.slot_balance '슬롯보유금', au.casino_balance '카지노보유금', IFNULL(sum(a.today_deposit),0) '당일입금', IFNULL(sum(a.today_withdraw),0) '당일출금', IFNULL(sum(a.today_deposit - a.today_withdraw),0) '당일입출금', IFNULL(sum(CASE WHEN u.type = 4 THEN b.c_m_today_betting ELSE 0 END),0) '당일카지노베팅', IFNULL(sum(CASE WHEN u.type = 4 THEN b.c_m_today_win ELSE 0 END),0) '당일카지노획득', IFNULL(sum(CASE WHEN u.type = 4 THEN b.c_m_today_betting - b.c_m_today_win ELSE 0 END),0) '당일카지노벳윈', IFNULL(sum(CASE WHEN u.type = 4 THEN b.s_m_today_betting ELSE 0 END),0) '당일슬롯베팅', IFNULL(sum(CASE WHEN u.type = 4 THEN b.s_m_today_win ELSE 0 END),0) '당일슬롯획득', IFNULL(sum(CASE WHEN u.type = 4 THEN b.s_m_today_betting - b.s_m_today_win ELSE 0 END),0) '당일슬롯벳윈', IFNULL(sum(c.c_m_today_roll),0) '당일카지노롤링', IFNULL(sum(c.s_m_today_roll),0) '당일슬롯롤링', IFNULL(sum(c.c_m_today_roll + c.s_m_today_roll),0) '당일롤링합계', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user) '회원수', (SELECT SUM(a.slot_balance) FROM user_asset_info AS a JOIN user AS u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.type <> 4) '에이전트 슬롯보유금', (SELECT SUM(a.casino_balance) FROM user_asset_info AS a JOIN user AS u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.type <> 4) '에이전트 카지노보유금', (SELECT SUM(a.point) FROM user_asset_info AS a JOIN user AS u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.type <> 4) '에이전트 포인트', (SELECT SUM(a.slot_balance) FROM user_asset_info AS a JOIN user AS u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.type = 4) '유저 슬롯보유금', (SELECT SUM(a.casino_balance) FROM user_asset_info AS a JOIN user AS u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.type = 4) '유저 카지노보유금', (SELECT SUM(a.point) FROM user_asset_info AS a JOIN user AS u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.type = 4) '유저 포인트' FROM user AS u LEFT JOIN admin_user AS au ON u.user_id = au.admin_user_id JOIN user_commission_info AS c ON u.user_id = c.user_id JOIN user_asset_info AS a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN user_betting_info AS b ON u.user_id = b.user_id

SELECT u.id '아이디', u.nickname '닉네임', u.type '타입', IFNULL(a.today_combine_deposit, 0) '당일입금', IFNULL(a.today_combine_withdraw, 0) '당일출금', IFNULL(a.today_combine_deposit - a.today_combine_withdraw, 0) '당일입출금', IFNULL(b.c_m_today_combine_betting,0) '당일카지노베팅', IFNULL(b.c_m_today_combine_win,0) '당일카지노획득', IFNULL(b.c_m_today_combine_betting - b.c_m_today_combine_win,0) '당일카지노벳윈', IFNULL(b.s_m_today_combine_betting,0) '당일슬롯베팅', IFNULL(b.s_m_today_combine_win,0) '당일슬롯획득', IFNULL(b.s_m_today_combine_betting - b.s_m_today_combine_win,0) '당일슬롯벳윈', IFNULL(c.c_m_today_roll,0) '당일카지노롤링', IFNULL(c.s_m_today_roll,0) '당일슬롯롤링', IFNULL(c.c_m_today_roll + c.s_m_today_roll,0) '당일롤링합계', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user) '회원수' FROM user AS u JOIN user_commission_info AS c ON u.user_id = c.user_id JOIN user_asset_info AS a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN user_betting_info AS b ON u.user_id = b.user_id JOIN hierarchy AS h ON u.user_id = h.user_id WHERE u.TYPE != 4
GROUP BY h.p_nick HAVING h.p_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id})
GROUP BY h.g_nick HAVING h.g_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id})
GROUP BY h.s_nick HAVING h.s_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id})
GROUP BY h.b_nick HAVING h.b_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id})

SELECT u.user_id , u.id '아이디', u.nickname '닉네임', u.type '타입', u.bank '은행', u.bank_num '계좌번호', u.bank_owner '예금주', a.slot_balance + a.casino_balance '보유금', a.point '포인트', a.today_combine_deposit '당일입금', a.today_combine_withdraw '당일출금', a.today_combine_deposit - a.today_combine_withdraw '당일입출금', (b.c_today_combine_betting + b.s_today_combine_betting) '당일베팅', (b.c_today_combine_win + b.s_today_combine_win) '당일획득', (b.c_today_combine_betting + b.s_today_combine_betting - b.c_today_combine_win - b.s_today_combine_win) '당일윈루즈', c.c_today_roll '카지노롤링', c.s_today_roll '슬롯롤링', count(*) '회원수', c.c_roll_rate '카지노롤링요율', c.s_roll_rate '슬롯롤링요율', c.lose_rate '루징요율' FROM user AS u JOIN user_asset_info AS a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN user_commission_info AS c ON u.user_id = c.user_id JOIN hierarchy AS h ON u.user_id = h.user_id JOIN user_betting_info AS b ON u.user_id = b.user_id
GROUP BY h.p_nick HAVING h.p_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id})
GROUP BY h.g_nick HAVING h.g_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id})
GROUP BY h.s_nick HAVING h.s_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id})
GROUP BY h.b_nick HAVING h.b_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id})

SELECT count(*) AS '당일가입' FROM user AS u JOIN hierarchy AS h ON u.user_id = h.user_id WHERE CAST(u.join_date AS DATE) = curdate()
AND h.p_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id}) AND CAST(u.join_date AS DATE) = curdate()
AND h.g_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id}) AND CAST(u.join_date AS DATE) = curdate()
AND h.s_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id}) AND CAST(u.join_date AS DATE) = curdate()
AND h.b_nick = (SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE id = #{id}) AND CAST(u.join_date AS DATE) = curdate()

SELECT Substr(신청일시, 1, 10) AS date, Sum(CASE WHEN 신청타입 = '입금' THEN 신청금액 ELSE 0 end) AS depositTotal, Sum(CASE WHEN 신청타입 = '출금' THEN 신청금액 ELSE 0 end) AS withdrawTotal FROM deposit_withdraw_view WHERE Str_to_date(신청일시, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') BETWEEN Date_sub(Now(),INTERVAL 7 day) AND Now() GROUP BY date;
